PICK_A_PACKAGE.TEXT: Pick a plan to continue. If you need more help with your subscription, you can

changeSubscriptionPurchasePageComponent.LEGAL_COPY: OFFER DETAILS: The subscription plan you choose will automatically renew and you will be charged according to your chosen payment method at the then-current rates for your selected plan. Fees and taxes apply. Please see our Customer Agreement at www.siriusxm.com for complete terms and how to cancel, which includes online methods or calling us at 1-866-635-2349. All fees, content and features are subject to change. Channel lineup varies by package.
